title._content: [Private David C. Colbert of Company C, 46th Virginia Infantry Regiment, with secession badge, canteen, pistol, and Bowie knife] (LOC)

description._content: [Private David C. Colbert of Company C, 46th Virginia Infantry Regiment, with secession badge, canteen, pistol, and Bowie knife] [between 1861 and 1865] 1 photograph : sixth-plate ambrotype ; 9.3 x 8.2 cm (case) Notes: Title devised by Library staff. Case: Rinhart, no. 137 (variant); vintage case provided by seller. Additional information in collections file. Notation in ink on manuscript recto: Miss Hester A. Dalton, by the polittness [sic] of Mr. D.C. Colbert. July the 12, 1863. Notation in graphite on manuscript recto: J. C. George. Notation in graphite on manuscript verso: Jullie C. George. Forget me not, Jullie B. George. Notation in colored pencil on manuscript verso: 9-2301-26. Photograph shows identified soldier; manuscript found with photograph. Deposit; Tom Liljenquist; 2011; (D 062). Forms part of: Liljenquist Family Collection of Civil War Photographs (Library of Congress). Subjects: Colbert, David C.,--1840-1865--Military service. Dalton, Hester A.,--b. 1845. Confederate States of America.--Army.--Virginia Infantry Regiment, 46th--People--1860-1870. Military uniforms--Confederate--1860-1870. Soldiers--Confederate--1860-1870. Canteens (Beverage containers)--1860-1870. Knives--1860-1870. Handguns--1860-1870. United States--History--Civil War, 1861-1865--Military personnel--Confederate. Format: Portrait photographs--1860-1870. Ambrotypes--1860-1870. Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication. Repository: Library of Congress, Prints and Photographs Division, Washington, D.C. 20540 USA, hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.print Part Of: Ambrotype/Tintype filing series (Library of Congress) (DLC) 2010650518 Liljenquist Family collection (Library of Congress) (DLC) 2010650519 More information about this collection is available at hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.lilj Higher resolution image is available (Persistent URL): hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/ppmsca.32064 Call Number: AMB/TIN no. 2772
